title.rendered: Level Up Your Resume with Jamie

content.rendered:
Jamie Brimage, Head of Talent Acquisition, EMEA, offers tips on how your resume can stand out at Millennium. 

  1. Edit your resume to keep it clean and concise, avoiding jargon.
  2. Proofread grammar and spelling.
  3. Highlight achievements and strengths that align to the role you want.
  4. Prepare to speak about everything you’ve listed.

excerpt.rendered: Jamie Brimage, Head of Talent Acquisition, EMEA, offers tips on how your resume can stand out at Millennium.
